name: You help a friend
description:
Objetivo: Manolo Cabezabolo debe reunir las 13 monedas y entregárselas a su amigo Nahu para salvar el mundo.

Summary

Educational video game created by children of 4th grade of primary school (8-9 years old) for the subject "Civic and Social Values".

The following topics have been worked on:

- Helping others.

- Working as a team.

- Achieving my goals.

- Respect.

Team

- Story design: Beatriz, Iria, David, Manuel, Álvaro, Nahuel and Irene.

- Level design: Irene and the teacher.

- Collectible items design: Álvaro and David.

- Main enemy design (Machuwepa): Iria.

- Spike design: Beatriz.

- Main character design: Manuel and Nahuel.

- Base design of other elements (flowers, trees, etc): 4th grade class A.

- Guide during the process: Juan Francisco (The teacher).
